influences: ''(in alphabetical order)'': Michelangelo Antonioni, Ingmar Bergman, Robert Bresson, John Cassavetes, Federico Fellini, John Ford, Jean-Luc Godard, Alfred Hitchcock, Elia Kazan, Stanley Kubrick, Akira Kurosawa, Michael Powell, Emeric Pressburger, Satyajit Ray, Jean Renoir, Roberto Rossellini, Luchino Visconti, Orson Welles
influenced: Quentin Tarantino, Paul Thomas Anderson, David Yates, John Woo, Tim Burton, David Fincher, Abel Ferrara
